0.1.name: wordpress/subpage-index
0.1.description:
The Subpage Index plugin was developed by Acumen in order to provide users with a simple way to include an index of subpages (or 'subpage' pages) within a given page on their site.

Once the plugin is installed, simply use the [subpageindex] shortcode in your page, and this will be replaced with an index of subpage pages when visitors hit that page.
